lead_paragraph: A report released Wednesday by the city’s Department of Investigation concludes that Corizon Health Inc., the contractor that runs health care at Rikers Island, repeatedly failed to screen and supervise its employees. The report also concluded that the two city agencies that were charged with overseeing Corizon failed their most basic responsibilities.

headline.main: Department of Investigation’s Report on Rikers Island Health Provider
